alert.note: Alert for Graham; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 10:02PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Norton and northern Graham Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 1001 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Beaver City to 3 miles west of Lenora. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Edmond around 1020 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern Kansas.
